page.title: 06OLD ELLERBY: A Survey
page.content:
{Karl Wilcock,}age 16, undertook a survey of the village in 1985 as a school project. Here are some of his findings. (Number of dwellings: 29)
25 couples, 1 man, 3 women alone 3 couples, no children 9 children grown up and left home 1 where 18 & 20 year old at home 9 with total of 19 children 7 at secondary schools 10 at junior schools 2 below school age
19 employed men, 2 retired (11 work in Hull, 5 on farms) 10 employed women, 2 retired (6 work in Hull) 1 unemployed, others self-employed
Four people have lived there 30-72 yrs
